summary.Title: Blicklayer, carpenter, mason or handyman
summary.Presentation: Norh is a young construction company in growth, which today consists of a small team of electr

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Norh is a young construction company in growth, which today consists of a small team of electricians and locksmiths in Copenhagen, where we all know each other really well and take good care of each other, it is important to us that we have fun at work.

This position is a new position in our company, and is therefore to be started on an hourly basis. We have plenty of customers, so it can quickly lead to full-time, for the right person who wants to work full-time.

In addition, we have outsourced all carpentry and masonry tasks to other companies / subcontractors.

We are otherwise very committed to providing our best and always delivering high quality and service. Therefore, you must also perform your work in the highest possible quality. It is also important that you have the drive and are motivated and at the same time structured in your work.

Our vision is to grow quietly and in the long run we are considering building houses, so it is a great advantage if you know something about building a single-family house or holiday homes. This summer, a construction project of a holiday home will start approx. 1 hour by car from Copenhagen.

Do you like working under freedom with responsibility, then you fit in perfectly with us. We are a very flexible employer.

We expect:

- That you are a skilled handyman and have extensive experience of working independently
- You are hardworking
- That you are motivated 
- That you speak Danish, Norwegian, Swedish or English

Plus:

- B driving license
- Experience in building houses and foundations

We look forward to hearing from you and receive a motivated application with picture via mail info@norh.eu.
